DOC.brief_summary: Influence of neonatal nutrition and growth on psychomotor development of 2 years preterm infants.-Joint influence of environmental factor (early nutrition) and genetics factors on feeding behaviour setting- up in a particular population of infants of whom nutrition and life conditions during first weeks of life were purely controlled.
DOC.brief_title: Food Habit Programming: Influence of Genetics and Early Nutrition in a Population of Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Preterm infants < 33 SA who stayed at least 2 weeks after birth in Nantes hospital, included in the " Grandir ensemble " network, 2 years old in 2008 and 2009
